news: [New release v0.84] Integrate Nashorn sandbox for Java 15, fix Mac glitches
[Roadmap] WAF fingerprint, Inject user defined query, Inject range of rows
[Since latest release] Dump jdk8 and ship Nashorn for jdk11 up to jdk15, Fix GUI glitches on Mac
[Contribute] Devops integration for PHP .NET Python and Node APIs, CTF and vuln application tests, ProGuard shrink
